title: Newest movie releases
description: Recent popular movie releases all collected. Here you can find inspiration for the next movie night! Just bring the snacks.

title: Gripp - Alpha version 1.0
description: Project Gripp's Frontend - Get a grip(p), a cardgame to promote mental health. Built in React Native. Create a user and log in!

title: Project Gripp
description: A project featuring a card game to promote mental health. Backend in Node.js and MongoDB, Express and frontend in React Native.

title: Authenticated
description: Mini fullstack project with an authenticated and encrypted backend. The user can create an account and log in.

title: Todo today
description: A todo app built with react and redux, packaged beautifully in bright orange. Here one can add tasks and tick them off.

title: Create, Read, Update & Delete
description: Create a user, read, search, filter, update and delete. A project packed with functionality and less design.

title: Music releases
description: What do you do with an old Spotify API? You of course collect the most popular songs of fall 2019.

title: Happy Thoughts
description: Full stack project. The Happy Thoughts project was updated with a shiny, new backend. Now all entries are saved in a database.
